title: Burrito

adjectives: Of, from, or pertaining to Mexico.
Of or relating to Mexico or its inhabitants
nouns: A native or inhabitant of Mexico
Person from Mexico or of Mexican descent.
A person from Mexico or of Mexican descent.
A burrito is a type of Mexican food consisting of a wheat flour tortilla wrapped or folded into a cylindrical shape to completely enclose the filling.
A flour tortilla folded around a filling
A Mexican dish consisting of a flour tortilla wrapped around a filling of meat and/or beans, cheese etc.
Cloak that is folded or wrapped around a person
In the context of clothing, a wrap can refer to a shawl or stole wrapped about the upper body, or a simple skirt-type garment made by wrapping a piece of material round the lower body.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: A Mexican or Tex-Mex burrito, featuring a wrapped flour tortilla filled with such ingredients as beef, rice, beans, cheese, tomato, lettuce, and sour cream. Served in foil on several major platforms, suggesting a Mission burrito associated with San Francisco. Not to be confused with the Stuffed Flatbread.
apple_vendor_description: The burrito emoji on Apple devices is a culinary masterpiece, plump and inviting with its tightly wrapped tortilla showcasing visible layers of filling.  Apple's signature glossy 3D shading makes the ingredients appear fresh and appetizing, with hints of red from tomatoes and green from lettuce peeking out.  Its soft rounded edges and realistic lighting contribute to its wholesome appeal, making it the perfect emoji to express hunger, a love for Mexican cuisine, or a celebration of a delicious meal shared on Apple devices.
